Double Punch:

::Double Punch silenty walks up behind Zardus, stopping at five feet away, in 
his stealth mode, cloaked from all view and most radar systems::
::The scorpion targeted a energy signature seeking missile at Zardus, his 
stinger also ready::
"One move, and you die." 
<Lord Hell Beast, we have an intruder out here (he gives a brief description, 
which Hell Beast should easily figure out it's Zardus, leader of the 
Alliance), what do you want me to do with him?>
